title: Green Corners
description: Transform dull corners into cozy green spaces using tall indoor plants like Snake Plant or Areca Palm.

title: Hanging Beauties
description: Use hanging planters near windows or balconies to create an eye-catching natural curtain.

title: Tabletop Magic
